EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Eric, Of course, it was my pleasure! You are in great hands with Meghan and we are excited to have you join the MBO team! Best wishes,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Schramm, Eric (Pittsburgh) [mailto:Eric.Schramm@hp.com] Sent: Wednesday, October 03, 2012 6:43 AM To: Sara Conde Cc: Meghan Parme; eric@dataSchramm.com Subject: RE: MBO Call Summary and HP Account Manager Contact Sara: Thanks again for taking the time to meet with me – I really appreciate it! Eric Schramm, CISSP, OCPTechnology ConsultantUSPS Federal Consulting SegmentMobile +1 412.721.6641 Email eric.schramm@hp.com <mailto:john.doe@hp.com> From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Tuesday, October 02, 2012 11:29 AM To: Schramm, Eric (Pittsburgh) Cc: Meghan Parme Subject: MBO Call Summary and HP Account Manager Contact Dear Eric , It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - In addition, we have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can acess our bill rate calculator by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#billrate> - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) Your contact at MBO Partners will be Meghan Parme (copied above.) You can schedule a time to speak with her here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/SQ7H6?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. (As a heads up, she is leaving on Thursday for vacation but she will have a back up while she is out.) Best of luck! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfkNQtgll6PSLI6Tgvz3QNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
